post.body: Three Dead Trolls In A Baggie? Wes is hilarious!
Aaaand now the newspaper bailout. Gee, what about television and RADIO? Can I get my old gig back? :)
I'm definitely a "New Convert" thanks mostly to Twitter.
That'd great, Paul! I'll try and tune in, and if I can't catch it, I'll definitely listen to the podcast on my micro FM.
Nope. It's artificial. I bought it 3 years ago. It's easier that way. It doesn't smell as nice though :(
Two words: Minority Report.
This is why you'll never see me take a $2000+ guitar or bass to a gig. Usually I play beaters that sound/play well. I've learned.
Yeah, that guitar got hit a few times by drunks, and was knocked ever a handful of times. Glad it wasn't mine.
Point taken. Indeed it has been up long enough. Mine went up a week before Christmas!
They tried putting advertisements on eggs. I wouldn't put it past them. Ad agencies will do ANYTHING! History dictates that.
Wow, so soon? :)
Very good interview. Now I want to read his books. I can totally dig what's he's saying. Some might be offended, but it's true.
Another Disco Demolition perhaps? I'd like to see one! I bought the DVD and enjoyed it.
Next thing you know, they'll have the easy payment plan for a quarter ounce.
That Thor story is hilarious!
That's a nice pic, Steve. It's saying, "I love ewe!" hahaha
very cool! Someone who is true to form. That is rare these days!
No doubt. Yeah I did the 'switch" in my head too. Not an option. It would be interesting though.
I'm into bikes, and so is the rest of my family, moreso than I am. My dad and sis race on the weekends.
Happy New Year to you as well! No hangover here, just a few war wound.s
